name: Thrusters Engaged
description:
Sorry for no WebGL version, it doesnt move the mouse to the center of the screen when it locks and completely breaks my interaction code as a result.

Fly through space on your extremely limited and important oxygen supply to recover your capitalist overlord's precious cargo. Just make sure not to lose your ship.

WebGL version has some graphical issues and crashes when you hit the escape key, but thats the exit game button anyway so i guess that works for now.
Cool i fixed it, i'm a real programmer dad.

If you have issues interacting try the downloadable version, WebGL doesnt center the mouse when it locks it to the screen and that breaks things.
